summary: LEFT FRONT CONTROL ARM WERE NOT REPLACED, ONLY THE BRAKE PADS.  DEALERSHIP CLAIMED THIS WOULD FIX THE PROBLEM.  HOWEVER, THERE WAS STILL A CLANKING NOISE AT FRONT LEFT AND RIGHT WHEEL AREA. CONSUMER'S INSPECTION REVEALED THAT ON BOTH SIDES THE PIVOT ARMS WERE LOOSE AND HAD ROTATED SEVERAL TIMES HITTING THE SUSPENSION ARM FRAME MOUNT AREA AND THERE WERE GOUGES IN THE FRAME MOUNT.  FURTHER INSPECTION ALSO REVEALED EXHAUST LEAK ON THE BOTTOM SIDE OF THE MUFFLER AT THE BACK WELD OR SEAL OF THE UNIT.  CONSUMER PLANNED ON TAKING VEHICLE TO ANOTHER DEALERSHIP.   *TT   *JB *TS
